---
title: "Setup"
---

- Make sure you have R and RStudio installed.
- Create an RStudio project in a new directory named `tdvr`.
- Create three directories within `tdvr/`:
  - `data-raw/`.
  - `R/`.
  - `plots/`.
- Download the raw data files from XXX to `data-raw/`.
- Download the template R scripts from XXX to `R/`.

Finally, ensure that you have the following packages installed by running:

``` r
install.packages(c("tidyverse", "here", "readxl", "ggbeeswarm"))
```

You can now move on to the next section.
